August 23, 1956
Mr. E. M. Foster
Box 253
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Mr. Foster!
In answer to your letter of August 9, we would like to give you information
regarding membership in the National Association of Educational broadcasters.
The NAE8 has three categories of membership, as follows!
Active - Educational institutions, public service organisations, etc.
owning and operating their own radio and/or television stations.
Associate - Institutions (as above) not owning stations, but operating
production centers and regularly producing programs over a
commercial outlet.
Affiliate - Any organization or individual interested in the general
fc. therance of educational broadcasting.
For Active members with radio stations, dues in the association are based on
rated transmitter power, as follows t
Glass A - 5 kw and over - Â£50*00
Glass B - 1 - 4.9 kw - 25.00
Class C - less than 1 kw - 15.00
Television stations with less than 5 kw video power pay #50.00 and those with
5 kv or more video power pay #100.00.
Associate and Affiliate members pay flO.OO a year. For this fee members receive
our monthly Newsletters the various reports and surveys we publish periodically;
services of our Placement Service, television engineer, legal counsel, management
consultant, etc.} plus the normal day to day services, information, and advice
that any national organisation gives its members. Under separate cover we are
sending you samples of some of the materials we regularly send our members, plus
other items which will give you more information about the Association. Of
course. Associate and Affiliate members do not receive as many of these materials
as regularly as Active members do.
